tool_description: This API brings random facts about different topics and subtopics
name: Random Facts
title: Random Facts

api_list.name: Get facts about subtopics
api_list.description: You can specify a subtopic for your facts. Subtopics available: Football, basketball, olympics, space, humans, animals,stats
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-facts4.p.rapidapi.com/subtopic/olympics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-facts4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-facts4.p.rapidapi.com/subtopic/{subtopic}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-facts4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get facts about topic
api_list.description: You can specify a topic for your facts. Topics available: Sports and Science
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-facts4.p.rapidapi.com/get/topic/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-facts4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Facts
api_list.description: Get an array of random facts, use "count" parameter to declare how many you want

api_list.name: Get Random Fact
api_list.description: Get a random fact out of our database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-facts4.p.rapidapi.com/get"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-facts4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
